text: Cigaritis rukma or silver-red silverline is a butterfly in the family Lycaenidae. It was described by Lionel de Niceville in 1889. It is found in the Indomalayan realm (Burma, Thailand, and Laos).Seitz, A., 1912-1927. Die Indo-Australien Tagfalter. Theclinae, Poritiinae, Hesperiidae. Grossschmetterlinge Erde 9: 799-1107, pls. 138-175. ==Subspecies== *C. r. rukma Sikkim, Bhutan, Thailand *C. r. sophia (D'Abrera, 1993) Yunnan ==References== ==External links== *Cigaritis at Markku Savela's Lepidoptera and Some Other Life Forms Category:Cigaritis Category:Butterflies described in 1889
title: Cigaritis rukma
